text: The Transrapid is a high speed train formerly developed in Germany. It uses magnetic levitation. It can go very fast, up to 500km/h. Since now it is only used in Shanghai. It was developed by the company Transrapid International GmbH & Co. KG, a company of the Siemens AG and the ThyssenKrupp AG. category:High-speed trains Category:Transport in the People's Republic of China Category:Shanghai
title: Transrapid
